chapter.title: Routing Messages With Wild Cards
chapter.para: JBoss Messaging allows the routing of messages via wildcard addresses. If a consumer is created with an address of say queue.* then it will receive any messages sent to addresses that match this, for instance queue.newsQueue or queue.mailQueue.
To enable this functionality set the property wild-card-routing-enabled in the jbm-configuration.xml file to true. This is true by default.
For more information on wild cards take a look at the wildcard-syntax chapter.
